faq.title: What is regular lisence?
faq.description: Regular license can be used for end products that do not charge users for access or service(access is free and there will be no monthly subscription fee). Single regular license can be used for single end product and end product can be used by you or your client. If you want to sell end product to multiple clients then you will need to purchase separate license for each client. The same rule applies if you want to use the same end product on multiple domains(unique setup). For more info on regular license you can check official description.

faq2.title: How do you process payments?
faq2.description: We accept Visa®, MasterCard®, American Express®, and PayPal®. So you can be confident that your credit card information will be kept safe and secure.

faq2.title: What counts towards the 100 response limits?
faq2.description: We count all responses submitted through all your forms in a month. If you already received 100 responses this month, you won’t be able to receive any more of them until next month when the counter resets.

faq2.title: What payment method do you accept?
faq2.description: 2Checkout accepts all types of credit and debit cards.

course.title: Learn English
course.description: Enhance your English skills to thrive in today's globalized world. Just as Angular revolutionizes web development, mastering English opens doors to opportunities. Explore grammar, conversation, and immersion techniques to accelerate your progress. Start your linguistic journey now and unlock new horizons of communication.
course.introduction: Embark on a journey to enhance your English proficiency. Explore a structured approach to mastering the language, enabling you to communicate effectively in various contexts.

levels_info.description: Embark on an enriching journey to master the English language! In these courses designed for beginners, you will explore core concepts, practice common patterns of English usage, and discover essential best practices to develop a strong foundation in the language.

Take your English proficiency to the next level with our intermediate courses! Dive deeper into the intricacies of the language as you refine your skills in grammar, vocabulary, and communication. Through engaging modules, you'll tackle more complex concepts, hone your writing and speaking abilities, and gain confidence in expressing yourself fluently.

Elevate your English fluency to an advanced level through our comprehensive courses designed to push your boundaries and expand your horizons. Dive into nuanced topics like advanced syntax, idiomatic expressions, and sophisticated literary analysis. Engage in lively discussions, tackle complex texts, and refine your writing with expert guidance. Our advanced modules empower you to communicate with eloquence and precision in both formal and informal settings.
